Olga Shirnina from Moscow, Russia, said a series of photos, bought to life and posted to her 23,000 followers, were removed by Facebook for breaching 'Community Standards'. JK Rowling's ex-husband is pictured for first time since he said: 'I slapped her but I'm not sorry'

Jorges Arantes (left today and right with his ex-wife on their wedding day) stepped out from his modest flat in the Portuguese city of Porto wearing a face mask and glasses. The former TV journalist was still unrepentant about admitting to a slapping his former wife (inset). He told MailOnline: 'She is not saying anything new. There is nothing new in this and there is nothing more to say on the matter. There is not point in speaking any more as there is nothing to say on what happened.' Arantes made a brief appearance outside his flat in the centre of Porto before stepping back inside.

After some serenity? How about a weekend getaway to The Castle's holiday house in Bonnie Doon - complete with jousting sticks and Erica Bana's punching bag

Fans of The Castle looking to escape for some serenity can now spend a weekend away in the iconic Bonnie Doon holiday house. The home which sits around 200km north-east of Melbourne is exactly how it was in the popular 1997 film - and even has Eric Bana's punching bag. The three-bedroom home is now available on AirBnb for $196 a night complete with a 'serenity' sign hung across the front gate.
